data.description:
Be the ultimate gun-fu mech! A roguelike, arcade-style shoot-them-up. Kill the monster horde! Crush them with sword-play + gun-play. Find your fight style! Throw your sword, or throw both! It's up to you! The action is intense and your mech must survive!

{419969027486715}

# FEATURES:
- Destroy enemies using a **combination of melee weapons and guns**. Figure out your fighting style. Defend with one, attack with another, itâ€™s up to you.

- **Get random skill upgrades after every enemy wave**. Combine them for a unique combo and match them to your play style. Grow stronger as you endure. No run will ever be the same!

- **Random maps** for each run

- **Ultimate attacks to be unlocked** - Orbital strikes, drones, missile barrages & more

- **Level designer** in the pipeline for upcoming updates. Play new levels designed by the community.

# CONTENT DRILLDOWN:
- 8 different weapons (melee, projectile and beam)
- 5 levels (3 to 4 different maps per level) and 5 bosses
- 50 different Perks/Upgrades given after each level: Faster reloads, triple fire, life leech, extra damage. 
- 5 Overloads: ultimate attacks to get you out of tough spots
- 39 types of enemies, average 450 enemies per level
- 38 achievements / rewards
- Short cut scenes after clearing each level

# Notes:
- Comfort level: Comfortable. Minimal movement. Can be played seated.
- Join the community on Discord - https://dsc.gg/lastmechstanding
